timeline.bodyText: Shall we rename this? It is not  isDependentTestPackage, rather it validates, whether found symbol defined in the parent package. Shall we say isRedeclaredInParentModule ?

timeline.bodyText: Do we need the check for the found symbol? hasSameOwner being false would imply it's not from the same (testable) package?
